title: Reverse Veteran

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Make another player go on alert at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When a player goes on alert, they will attack all players who visit them that night with a Powerful attack.
- While on alert, they have Basic defense.
- You may only make others go on alert thrice.
*- The host interprets whether or not this role's ability leads to its own death.*
